data_processing_onboarding_content_1: Data Processing is a managed service you can use to quickly and easily launch Apache Spark jobs and manage your spending.
data_processing_onboarding_content_2: With Data Processing, your job is launched in just a few seconds, and you only pay for the execution time and the resources you use. Deployment and monitoring are automated â€” so you can just focus on your code. With Data Processing, you can launch data processing and analysis, machine learning and artificial intelligence jobs in Java, Scala and Python.
data_processing_onboarding_content_3: By continuing, you authorise the OVHcloud Data Processing service to access the content stored in your object containers within the current project. This access will be used solely to execute your code, and save your execution logs.
